name: Amy's Spicy Beans and Rice
author: STRIDEAM
summary: This is a fast, easy and yummy vegetarian dinner, or you can add chicken or sausage if you miss the meat!
ingredients: 2  fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
1 teaspoon ground cumin, or to taste
1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste
½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
½ (2 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a saucepan bring  the water to a boil
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 40 minutes
Meanwhile, pour beans into a 2 quart casserole
Sprinkle with jalapenos, cumin, chili powder and black pepper
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes
Sprinkle with cheese, green onions and olives
